properties.areaDesc: Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties; Modoc County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 4:23AM PST until January 9 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches.

* WHERE...Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties and
Modoc County, including Dorris, Macdoel, Tulelake, Alturas,
Adin and Likely, including Highways 97, 139 and 299 and 395.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Slippery snow covered roads and reduced visibility
will cause hazardous travel conditions.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
* Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.

* Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and
limited visibilities.

* See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions.

* A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow
will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING
